languages.text: "Славная вышла сеча, да вот только без пира на захваченной ладье я не чувствую полного довольства".

traits.locale_text: "Славная вышла сеча, да вот только без пира на захваченной ладье я не чувствую полного довольства".

languages.text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
languages.original_text: "Славная вышла сеча, да вот только без пира на захваченной ладье я не чувствую полного довольства".

traits.locale_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
"A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
"A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
"A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
"A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
"A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

languages.text: 「見事な戦いだった。だが、奪ったドレッカールの船上で宴を開かなかったのは、いまひとつ物足りなかったな」
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: 「見事な戦いだった。だが、奪ったドレッカールの船上で宴を開かなかったのは、いまひとつ物足りなかったな」

languages.text: "Eine edle Schlacht war das. Nur ein Gelage an Bord des gekaperten Drekkar hat gefehlt."
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: "Eine edle Schlacht war das. Nur ein Gelage an Bord des gekaperten Drekkar hat gefehlt."

languages.text: « C'était un beau combat, mais sans festin à bord du drekkar capturé, je reste sur ma faim. »
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: « C'était un beau combat, mais sans festin à bord du drekkar capturé, je reste sur ma faim. »

languages.text: «Ha sido una batalla memorable, aunque habría resultado más satisfactoria celebrando un festín a bordo del drekkar capturado».
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido una batalla memorable, aunque habría resultado más satisfactoria celebrando un festín a bordo del drekkar capturado».

languages.text: “这确实是场精彩的战斗。不过，要是不能在抢来的撞角长船上饱餐一顿的话，那恐怕就没那么让人满意了。”
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: “这确实是场精彩的战斗。不过，要是不能在抢来的撞角长船上饱餐一顿的话，那恐怕就没那么让人满意了。”

languages.text: "Sıkı savaştı ama ele geçirdiğimiz drekkarların güvertesinde ziyafet verememek, içimde uktedir."
languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."

traits.locale_text: "Sıkı savaştı ama yakaladığımız drekkarların güvertesinde ziyafet verememek, içimde uktedir."

languages.original_text: "A fine battle that was, but it was not as satisfying without a feast on board the captured drekkar."
